item.title: vi how to copy to clipboard mac
item.description:
So you want to copy content in vi to system clipboard? You can use the register "* (i.e "*y to copy to clipboard, "*p to paste from clipboard).

ake sure you have +clipboard feature enabled (Vim 7.3+). You can check by running vim --version | grep clipboard. If you don’t see , just run brew install macvim --override-system-vim
